name: Dummy Dave's Parkour Playground
description:
In this endless runner, your aim is to parkour across the playground as far as possible.

Use WASD to move, spacebar to jump, and the mouse to look around.

This game was created as a submission to the Indie Game Dev Beginners Game Jam December 2022, which lasted for 6 days. The theme was "nostalgia" and this game fits because we all have fond memories of going bonkers on the playground as a kid.
